description: We are excited to finally release our much anticipated slim folio case for the Nexus 7.The Blurex Slim Folio case is not only a sleek and stylish cover for your device, it provides unprecedented protection from accidental scratches and bumps.This case was manufactured  with laser precision accuracy to fit your device like a glove, while keeping the necessary ports open for easy access.Its unique stand feature lets you convert the cover into a multi-angled stand for added comfort and efficiency. This case was hand crafted from durable PU leather material with soft, tablet-friendly microfiber interior liningSecurely holds your Nexus 7 in place without obstructing any part of the screenProtect and secure your device by absorbing shock from accidental dropsCustom cutouts for direct access to all device features including access to the front and back speakersPremium synthetic leather with soft microfiber interior liningConverts into a multi-angle stand with the groves in the case
title: Blurex Ultra-Slim Case for Google Nexus 7 inch Tablet -- With built in Multi-Angle Stand + Premium Screen Protector Film (Clear),black
